byline.original: By CATHERINE RAMPELL and RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr

abstract: Rick Perry announces his support for flat tax, sharpening contrast with his Republican rival Mitt Romney and capitalizing on popular frustration with tax system among Republican primary voters.
snippet: Gov. Rick Perry’s plan is expected to resemble a version previously advocated by the former presidential candidate Steve Forbes.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry’s plan is expected to resemble a version previously advocated by the former presidential candidate Steve Forbes.

headline.main: Perry Says He Backs Flat Tax, Drawing a Contrast With Romney
headline.print_headline: Perry Says He Backs Flat Tax, Drawing a Contrast With Romney
headline.seo: Perry Says He Supports a Simple Flat Tax
